front.title: IEC/IEEE International Standard - Communication networks and systems for power utility automation – Part 9-3: Precision time protocol profile for power utility automation

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This part of IEC 61850 specifies a precision time protocol (PTP) profile of IEC 61588:2009; IEEE Std 1588-2008 applicable to power utility automation, which allows compliance with the highest synchronization classes of IEC 61850-5 and IEC 61869-9.
